al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wajaʿala al-ẓulumāti wal-nūra thumma alladhīna kafarū birabbihim yaʿdilūna
huwa alladhī khalaqakum min ṭīnin thumma qaḍā ajalan wa-ajalun musamman ʿindahu thumma antum tamtarūna
wahuwa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wafī al-arḍi yaʿlamu sirrakum wajahrakum wayaʿlamu mā taksibūna
wamā tatīhim min āyatin min āyāti rabbihim illā kānū ʿanhā muʿ'riḍīna
faqad kadhabū bil-ḥaqi lammā jāahum fasawfa yatīhim anbāu mā kānū bihi yastahziūna

alam yaraw kam ahlaknā min qablihim min qarnin makkannāhum fī al-arḍi mā lam numakkin lakum wa-arsalnā al-samāa ʿalayhim mid'rāran wajaʿalnā al-anhāra tajrī min taḥtihim fa-ahlaknāhum bidhunūbihim wa-anshanā min baʿdihim qarnan ākharīna
walaw nazzalnā ʿalayka kitāban fī qir'ṭāsin falamasūhu bi-aydīhim laqāla alladhīna kafarū in hādhā illā siḥ'run mubīnun
waqālū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi malakun walaw anzalnā malakan laquḍiya al-amru thumma lā yunẓarūna
walaw jaʿalnāhu malakan lajaʿalnāhu rajulan walalabasnā ʿalayhim mā yalbisūna
walaqadi us'tuh'zi-a birusulin min qablika faḥāqa bi-alladhīna sakhirū min'hum mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
qul sīrū fī al-arḍi thumma unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
qul liman mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi qul lillahi kataba ʿalā nafsihi al-raḥmata layajmaʿannakum ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati lā rayba fīhi alladhīna khasirū anfusahum fahum lā yu'minūna
walahu mā sakana fī al-layli wal-nahāri wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
qul aghayra al-lahi attakhidhu waliyyan fāṭiri al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa yuṭ'ʿimu walā yuṭ'ʿamu qul innī umir'tu an akūna awwala man aslama walā takūnanna mina al-mush'rikīna
qul innī akhāfu in ʿaṣaytu rabbī ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
man yuṣ'raf ʿanhu yawma-idhin faqad raḥimahu wadhālika al-fawzu al-mubīnu
wa-in yamsaska al-lahu biḍurrin falā kāshifa lahu illā huwa wa-in yamsaska bikhayrin fahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
wahuwa al-qāhiru fawqa ʿibādihi wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-khabīru

qul ayyu shayin akbaru shahādatan quli al-lahu shahīdun baynī wabaynakum waūḥiya ilayya hādhā al-qur'ānu li-undhirakum bihi waman balagha a-innakum latashhadūna anna maʿa al-lahi ālihatan ukh'rā qul lā ashhadu qul innamā huwa ilāhun wāḥidun wa-innanī barīon mimmā tush'rikūna
alladhīna ātaynāhumu al-kitāba yaʿrifūnahu kamā yaʿrifūna abnāahumu alladhīna khasirū anfusahum fahum lā yu'minūna
waman aẓlamu mimmani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biāyātihi innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-ẓālimūna
wayawma naḥshuruhum jamīʿan thumma naqūlu lilladhīna ashrakū ayna shurakāukumu alladhīna kuntum tazʿumūna
thumma lam takun fit'natuhum illā an qālū wal-lahi rabbinā mā kunnā mush'rikīna
unẓur kayfa kadhabū ʿalā anfusihim waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna

wamin'hum man yastamiʿu ilayka wajaʿalnā ʿalā qulūbihim akinnatan an yafqahūhu wafī ādhānihim waqran wa-in yaraw kulla āyatin lā yu'minū bihā ḥattā idhā jāūka yujādilūnaka yaqūlu alladhīna kafarū in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
wahum yanhawna ʿanhu wayanawna ʿanhu wa-in yuh'likūna illā anfusahum wamā yashʿurūna
walaw tarā idh wuqifū ʿalā al-nāri faqālū yālaytanā nuraddu walā nukadhiba biāyāti rabbinā wanakūna mina al-mu'minīna
bal badā lahum mā kānū yukh'fūna min qablu walaw ruddū laʿādū limā nuhū ʿanhu wa-innahum lakādhibūna
waqālū in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
walaw tarā idh wuqifū ʿalā rabbihim qāla alaysa hādhā bil-ḥaqi qālū balā warabbinā qāla fadhūqū al-ʿadhāba bimā kuntum takfurūna
qad khasira alladhīna kadhabū biliqāi al-lahi ḥattā idhā jāathumu al-sāʿatu baghtatan qālū yāḥasratanā ʿalā mā farraṭnā fīhā wahum yaḥmilūna awzārahum ʿalā ẓuhūrihim alā sāa mā yazirūna
wamā al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā illā laʿibun walahwun walalddāru al-ākhiratu khayrun lilladhīna yattaqūna afalā taʿqilūna
qad naʿlamu innahu layaḥzunuka alladhī yaqūlūna fa-innahum lā yukadhibūnaka walākinna al-ẓālimīna biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
walaqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika faṣabarū ʿalā mā kudhibū waūdhū ḥattā atāhum naṣrunā walā mubaddila likalimāti al-lahi walaqad jāaka min naba-i al-mur'salīna

wa-in kāna kabura ʿalayka iʿ'rāḍuhum fa-ini is'taṭaʿta an tabtaghiya nafaqan fī al-arḍi aw sullaman fī al-samāi fatatiyahum biāyatin walaw shāa al-lahu lajamaʿahum ʿalā al-hudā falā takūnanna mina al-jāhilīna
innamā yastajību alladhīna yasmaʿūna wal-mawtā yabʿathuhumu al-lahu thumma ilayhi yur'jaʿūna
waqālū lawlā nuzzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi qul inna al-laha qādirun ʿalā an yunazzila āyatan walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
wamā min dābbatin fī al-arḍi walā ṭāirin yaṭīru bijanāḥayhi illā umamun amthālukum mā farraṭnā fī al-kitābi min shayin thumma ilā rabbihim yuḥ'sharūna
wa-alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā ṣummun wabuk'mun fī al-ẓulumāti man yasha-i al-lahu yuḍ'lil'hu waman yasha yajʿalhu ʿalā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
qul ara-aytakum in atākum ʿadhābu al-lahi aw atatkumu al-sāʿatu aghayra al-lahi tadʿūna in kuntum ṣādiqīna
bal iyyāhu tadʿūna fayakshifu mā tadʿūna ilayhi in shāa watansawna mā tush'rikūna
walaqad arsalnā ilā umamin min qablika fa-akhadhnāhum bil-basāi wal-ḍarāi laʿallahum yataḍarraʿūna
falawlā idh jāahum basunā taḍarraʿū walākin qasat qulūbuhum wazayyana lahumu al-shayṭānu mā kānū yaʿmalūna
falammā nasū mā dhukkirū bihi fataḥnā ʿalayhim abwāba kulli shayin ḥattā idhā fariḥū bimā ūtū akhadhnāhum baghtatan fa-idhā hum mub'lisūna
faquṭiʿa dābiru al-qawmi alladhīna ẓalamū wal-ḥamdu lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
qul ara-aytum in akhadha al-lahu samʿakum wa-abṣārakum wakhatama ʿalā qulūbikum man ilāhun ghayru al-lahi yatīkum bihi unẓur kayfa nuṣarrifu al-āyāti thumma hum yaṣdifūna
qul ara-aytakum in atākum ʿadhābu al-lahi baghtatan aw jahratan hal yuh'laku illā al-qawmu al-ẓālimūna
wamā nur'silu al-mur'salīna illā mubashirīna wamundhirīna faman āmana wa-aṣlaḥa falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
wa-alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā yamassuhumu al-ʿadhābu bimā kānū yafsuqūna
qul lā aqūlu lakum ʿindī khazāinu al-lahi walā aʿlamu al-ghayba walā aqūlu lakum innī malakun in attabiʿu illā mā yūḥā ilayya qul hal yastawī al-aʿmā wal-baṣīru afalā tatafakkarūna
wa-andhir bihi alladhīna yakhāfūna an yuḥ'sharū ilā rabbihim laysa lahum min dūnihi waliyyun walā shafīʿun laʿallahum yattaqūna
walā taṭrudi alladhīna yadʿūna rabbahum bil-ghadati wal-ʿashiyi yurīdūna wajhahu mā ʿalayka min ḥisābihim min shayin wamā min ḥisābika ʿalayhim min shayin fataṭrudahum fatakūna mina al-ẓālimīna
wakadhālika fatannā baʿḍahum bibaʿḍin liyaqūlū ahāulāi manna al-lahu ʿalayhim min bayninā alaysa al-lahu bi-aʿlama bil-shākirīna

wa-idhā jāaka alladhīna yu'minūna biāyātinā faqul salāmun ʿalaykum kataba rabbukum ʿalā nafsihi al-raḥmata annahu man ʿamila minkum sūan bijahālatin thumma tāba min baʿdihi wa-aṣlaḥa fa-annahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
wakadhālika nufaṣṣilu al-āyāti walitastabīna sabīlu al-muj'rimīna
qul innī nuhītu an aʿbuda alladhīna tadʿūna min dūni al-lahi qul lā attabiʿu ahwāakum qad ḍalaltu idhan wamā anā mina al-muh'tadīna
qul innī ʿalā bayyinatin min rabbī wakadhabtum bihi mā ʿindī mā tastaʿjilūna bihi ini al-ḥuk'mu illā lillahi yaquṣṣu al-ḥaqa wahuwa khayru al-fāṣilīna
qul law anna ʿindī mā tastaʿjilūna bihi laquḍiya al-amru baynī wabaynakum wal-lahu aʿlamu bil-ẓālimīna

waʿindahu mafātiḥu al-ghaybi lā yaʿlamuhā illā huwa wayaʿlamu mā fī al-bari wal-baḥri wamā tasquṭu min waraqatin illā yaʿlamuhā walā ḥabbatin fī ẓulumāti al-arḍi walā raṭbin walā yābisin illā fī kitābin mubīnin
wahuwa alladhī yatawaffākum bi-al-layli wayaʿlamu mā jaraḥtum bil-nahāri thumma yabʿathukum fīhi liyuq'ḍā ajalun musamman thumma ilayhi marjiʿukum thumma yunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
wahuwa al-qāhiru fawqa ʿibādihi wayur'silu ʿalaykum ḥafaẓatan ḥattā idhā jāa aḥadakumu al-mawtu tawaffathu rusulunā wahum lā yufarriṭūna
thumma ruddū ilā al-lahi mawlāhumu al-ḥaqi alā lahu al-ḥuk'mu wahuwa asraʿu al-ḥāsibīna
qul man yunajjīkum min ẓulumāti al-bari wal-baḥri tadʿūnahu taḍarruʿan wakhuf'yatan la-in anjānā min hādhihi lanakūnanna mina al-shākirīna
quli al-lahu yunajjīkum min'hā wamin kulli karbin thumma antum tush'rikūna
qul huwa al-qādiru ʿalā an yabʿatha ʿalaykum ʿadhāban min fawqikum aw min taḥti arjulikum aw yalbisakum shiyaʿan wayudhīqa baʿḍakum basa baʿḍin unẓur kayfa nuṣarrifu al-āyāti laʿallahum yafqahūna
wakadhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa al-ḥaqu qul lastu ʿalaykum biwakīlin
likulli naba-in mus'taqarrun wasawfa taʿlamūna
wa-idhā ra-ayta alladhīna yakhūḍūna fī āyātinā fa-aʿriḍ ʿanhum ḥattā yakhūḍū fī ḥadīthin ghayrihi wa-immā yunsiyannaka al-shayṭānu falā taqʿud baʿda al-dhik'rā maʿa al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
wamā ʿalā alladhīna yattaqūna min ḥisābihim min shayin walākin dhik'rā laʿallahum yattaqūna

wadhari alladhīna ittakhadhū dīnahum laʿiban walahwan wagharrathumu al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā wadhakkir bihi an tub'sala nafsun bimā kasabat laysa lahā min dūni al-lahi waliyyun walā shafīʿun wa-in taʿdil kulla ʿadlin lā yu'khadh min'hā ulāika alladhīna ub'silū bimā kasabū lahum sharābun min ḥamīmin waʿadhābun alīmun bimā kānū yakfurūna

qul anadʿū min dūni al-lahi mā lā yanfaʿunā walā yaḍurrunā wanuraddu ʿalā aʿqābinā baʿda idh hadānā al-lahu ka-alladhī is'tahwathu al-shayāṭīnu fī al-arḍi ḥayrāna lahu aṣḥābun yadʿūnahu ilā al-hudā i'tinā qul inna hudā al-lahi huwa al-hudā wa-umir'nā linus'lima lirabbi al-ʿālamīna
wa-an aqīmū al-ṣalata wa-ittaqūhu wahuwa alladhī ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
wahuwa alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi wayawma yaqūlu kun fayakūnu qawluhu al-ḥaqu walahu al-mul'ku yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-khabīru
wa-idh qāla ib'rāhīmu li-abīhi āzara atattakhidhu aṣnāman ālihatan innī arāka waqawmaka fī ḍalālin mubīnin
wakadhālika nurī ib'rāhīma malakūta al-samāwāti wal-arḍi waliyakūna mina al-mūqinīna
falammā janna ʿalayhi al-laylu raā kawkaban qāla hādhā rabbī falammā afala qāla lā uḥibbu al-āfilīna
falammā raā al-qamara bāzighan qāla hādhā rabbī falammā afala qāla la-in lam yahdinī rabbī la-akūnanna mina al-qawmi al-ḍālīna
falammā raā al-shamsa bāzighatan qāla hādhā rabbī hādhā akbaru falammā afalat qāla yāqawmi innī barīon mimmā tush'rikūna
innī wajjahtu wajhiya lilladhī faṭara al-samāwāti wal-arḍa ḥanīfan wamā anā mina al-mush'rikīna
waḥājjahu qawmuhu qāla atuḥājjūnnī fī al-lahi waqad hadāni walā akhāfu mā tush'rikūna bihi illā an yashāa rabbī shayan wasiʿa rabbī kulla shayin ʿil'man afalā tatadhakkarūna
wakayfa akhāfu mā ashraktum walā takhāfūna annakum ashraktum bil-lahi mā lam yunazzil bihi ʿalaykum sul'ṭānan fa-ayyu al-farīqayni aḥaqqu bil-amni in kuntum taʿlamūna
alladhīna āmanū walam yalbisū īmānahum biẓul'min ulāika lahumu al-amnu wahum muh'tadūna
watil'ka ḥujjatunā ātaynāhā ib'rāhīma ʿalā qawmihi narfaʿu darajātin man nashāu inna rabbaka ḥakīmun ʿalīmun
wawahabnā lahu is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba kullan hadaynā wanūḥan hadaynā min qablu wamin dhurriyyatihi dāwūda wasulaymāna wa-ayyūba wayūsufa wamūsā wahārūna wakadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
wazakariyyā wayaḥyā waʿīsā wa-il'yāsa kullun mina al-ṣāliḥīna
wa-is'māʿīla wal-yasaʿa wayūnusa walūṭan wakullan faḍḍalnā ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
wamin ābāihim wadhurriyyātihim wa-ikh'wānihim wa-ij'tabaynāhum wahadaynāhum ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
dhālika hudā al-lahi yahdī bihi man yashāu min ʿibādihi walaw ashrakū laḥabiṭa ʿanhum mā kānū yaʿmalūna
ulāika alladhīna ātaynāhumu al-kitāba wal-ḥuk'ma wal-nubuwata fa-in yakfur bihā hāulāi faqad wakkalnā bihā qawman laysū bihā bikāfirīna
ulāika alladhīna hadā al-lahu fabihudāhumu iq'tadih qul lā asalukum ʿalayhi ajran in huwa illā dhik'rā lil'ʿālamīna

wamā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi idh qālū mā anzala al-lahu ʿalā basharin min shayin qul man anzala al-kitāba alladhī jāa bihi mūsā nūran wahudan lilnnāsi tajʿalūnahu qarāṭīsa tub'dūnahā watukh'fūna kathīran waʿullim'tum mā lam taʿlamū antum walā ābāukum quli al-lahu thumma dharhum fī khawḍihim yalʿabūna
wahādhā kitābun anzalnāhu mubārakun muṣaddiqu alladhī bayna yadayhi walitundhira umma al-qurā waman ḥawlahā wa-alladhīna yu'minūna bil-ākhirati yu'minūna bihi wahum ʿalā ṣalātihim yuḥāfiẓūna

waman aẓlamu mimmani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban aw qāla ūḥiya ilayya walam yūḥa ilayhi shayon waman qāla sa-unzilu mith'la mā anzala al-lahu walaw tarā idhi al-ẓālimūna fī ghamarāti al-mawti wal-malāikatu bāsiṭū aydīhim akhrijū anfusakumu al-yawma tuj'zawna ʿadhāba al-hūni bimā kuntum taqūlūna ʿalā al-lahi ghayra al-ḥaqi wakuntum ʿan āyātihi tastakbirūna

walaqad ji'tumūnā furādā kamā khalaqnākum awwala marratin wataraktum mā khawwalnākum warāa ẓuhūrikum wamā narā maʿakum shufaʿāakumu alladhīna zaʿamtum annahum fīkum shurakāu laqad taqaṭṭaʿa baynakum waḍalla ʿankum mā kuntum tazʿumūna
inna al-laha fāliqu al-ḥabi wal-nawā yukh'riju al-ḥaya mina al-mayiti wamukh'riju al-mayiti mina al-ḥayi dhālikumu al-lahu fa-annā tu'fakūna
fāliqu al-iṣ'bāḥi wajaʿala al-layla sakanan wal-shamsa wal-qamara ḥus'bānan dhālika taqdīru al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
wahuwa alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-nujūma litahtadū bihā fī ẓulumāti al-bari wal-baḥri qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yaʿlamūna
wahuwa alladhī ansha-akum min nafsin wāḥidatin famus'taqarrun wamus'tawdaʿun qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yafqahūna

wahuwa alladhī anzala mina al-samāi māan fa-akhrajnā bihi nabāta kulli shayin fa-akhrajnā min'hu khaḍiran nukh'riju min'hu ḥabban mutarākiban wamina al-nakhli min ṭalʿihā qin'wānun dāniyatun wajannātin min aʿnābin wal-zaytūna wal-rumāna mush'tabihan waghayra mutashābihin unẓurū ilā thamarihi idhā athmara wayanʿihi inna fī dhālikum laāyātin liqawmin yu'minūna
wajaʿalū lillahi shurakāa al-jina wakhalaqahum wakharaqū lahu banīna wabanātin bighayri ʿil'min sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yaṣifūna
badīʿu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi annā yakūnu lahu waladun walam takun lahu ṣāḥibatun wakhalaqa kulla shayin wahuwa bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
dhālikumu al-lahu rabbukum lā ilāha illā huwa khāliqu kulli shayin fa-uʿ'budūhu wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin wakīlun
lā tud'rikuhu al-abṣāru wahuwa yud'riku al-abṣāra wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
qad jāakum baṣāiru min rabbikum faman abṣara falinafsihi waman ʿamiya faʿalayhā wamā anā ʿalaykum biḥafīẓin
wakadhālika nuṣarrifu al-āyāti waliyaqūlū darasta walinubayyinahu liqawmin yaʿlamūna
ittabiʿ mā ūḥiya ilayka min rabbika lā ilāha illā huwa wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-mush'rikīna
walaw shāa al-lahu mā ashrakū wamā jaʿalnāka ʿalayhim ḥafīẓan wamā anta ʿalayhim biwakīlin

walā tasubbū alladhīna yadʿūna min dūni al-lahi fayasubbū al-laha ʿadwan bighayri ʿil'min kadhālika zayyannā likulli ummatin ʿamalahum thumma ilā rabbihim marjiʿuhum fayunabbi-uhum bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
wa-aqsamū bil-lahi jahda aymānihim la-in jāathum āyatun layu'minunna bihā qul innamā al-āyātu ʿinda al-lahi wamā yush'ʿirukum annahā idhā jāat lā yu'minūna
wanuqallibu afidatahum wa-abṣārahum kamā lam yu'minū bihi awwala marratin wanadharuhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
walaw annanā nazzalnā ilayhimu al-malāikata wakallamahumu al-mawtā waḥasharnā ʿalayhim kulla shayin qubulan mā kānū liyu'minū illā an yashāa al-lahu walākinna aktharahum yajhalūna
wakadhālika jaʿalnā likulli nabiyyin ʿaduwwan shayāṭīna al-insi wal-jini yūḥī baʿḍuhum ilā baʿḍin zukh'rufa al-qawli ghurūran walaw shāa rabbuka mā faʿalūhu fadharhum wamā yaftarūna
walitaṣghā ilayhi afidatu alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati waliyarḍawhu waliyaqtarifū mā hum muq'tarifūna

afaghayra al-lahi abtaghī ḥakaman wahuwa alladhī anzala ilaykumu al-kitāba mufaṣṣalan wa-alladhīna ātaynāhumu al-kitāba yaʿlamūna annahu munazzalun min rabbika bil-ḥaqi falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
watammat kalimatu rabbika ṣid'qan waʿadlan lā mubaddila likalimātihi wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
wa-in tuṭiʿ akthara man fī al-arḍi yuḍillūka ʿan sabīli al-lahi in yattabiʿūna illā al-ẓana wa-in hum illā yakhruṣūna
inna rabbaka huwa aʿlamu man yaḍillu ʿan sabīlihi wahuwa aʿlamu bil-muh'tadīna
fakulū mimmā dhukira us'mu al-lahi ʿalayhi in kuntum biāyātihi mu'minīna

wamā lakum allā takulū mimmā dhukira us'mu al-lahi ʿalayhi waqad faṣṣala lakum mā ḥarrama ʿalaykum illā mā uḍ'ṭurir'tum ilayhi wa-inna kathīran layuḍillūna bi-ahwāihim bighayri ʿil'min inna rabbaka huwa aʿlamu bil-muʿ'tadīna
wadharū ẓāhira al-ith'mi wabāṭinahu inna alladhīna yaksibūna al-ith'ma sayuj'zawna bimā kānū yaqtarifūna
walā takulū mimmā lam yudh'kari us'mu al-lahi ʿalayhi wa-innahu lafis'qun wa-inna al-shayāṭīna layūḥūna ilā awliyāihim liyujādilūkum wa-in aṭaʿtumūhum innakum lamush'rikūna
awaman kāna maytan fa-aḥyaynāhu wajaʿalnā lahu nūran yamshī bihi fī al-nāsi kaman mathaluhu fī al-ẓulumāti laysa bikhārijin min'hā kadhālika zuyyina lil'kāfirīna mā kānū yaʿmalūna
wakadhālika jaʿalnā fī kulli qaryatin akābira muj'rimīhā liyamkurū fīhā wamā yamkurūna illā bi-anfusihim wamā yashʿurūna

wa-idhā jāathum āyatun qālū lan nu'mina ḥattā nu'tā mith'la mā ūtiya rusulu al-lahi al-lahu aʿlamu ḥaythu yajʿalu risālatahu sayuṣību alladhīna ajramū ṣaghārun ʿinda al-lahi waʿadhābun shadīdun bimā kānū yamkurūna

faman yuridi al-lahu an yahdiyahu yashraḥ ṣadrahu lil'is'lāmi waman yurid an yuḍillahu yajʿal ṣadrahu ḍayyiqan ḥarajan ka-annamā yaṣṣaʿʿadu fī al-samāi kadhālika yajʿalu al-lahu al-rij'sa ʿalā alladhīna lā yu'minūna
wahādhā ṣirāṭu rabbika mus'taqīman qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yadhakkarūna
lahum dāru al-salāmi ʿinda rabbihim wahuwa waliyyuhum bimā kānū yaʿmalūna

wayawma yaḥshuruhum jamīʿan yāmaʿshara al-jini qadi is'takthartum mina al-insi waqāla awliyāuhum mina al-insi rabbanā is'tamtaʿa baʿḍunā bibaʿḍin wabalaghnā ajalanā alladhī ajjalta lanā qāla al-nāru mathwākum khālidīna fīhā illā mā shāa al-lahu inna rabbaka ḥakīmun ʿalīmun
wakadhālika nuwallī baʿḍa al-ẓālimīna baʿḍan bimā kānū yaksibūna

yāmaʿshara al-jini wal-insi alam yatikum rusulun minkum yaquṣṣūna ʿalaykum āyātī wayundhirūnakum liqāa yawmikum hādhā qālū shahid'nā ʿalā anfusinā wagharrathumu al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā washahidū ʿalā anfusihim annahum kānū kāfirīna
dhālika an lam yakun rabbuka muh'lika al-qurā biẓul'min wa-ahluhā ghāfilūna
walikullin darajātun mimmā ʿamilū wamā rabbuka bighāfilin ʿammā yaʿmalūna
warabbuka al-ghaniyu dhū al-raḥmati in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayastakhlif min baʿdikum mā yashāu kamā ansha-akum min dhurriyyati qawmin ākharīna
inna mā tūʿadūna laātin wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
qul yāqawmi iʿ'malū ʿalā makānatikum innī ʿāmilun fasawfa taʿlamūna man takūnu lahu ʿāqibatu al-dāri innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-ẓālimūna

wajaʿalū lillahi mimmā dhara-a mina al-ḥarthi wal-anʿāmi naṣīban faqālū hādhā lillahi bizaʿmihim wahādhā lishurakāinā famā kāna lishurakāihim falā yaṣilu ilā al-lahi wamā kāna lillahi fahuwa yaṣilu ilā shurakāihim sāa mā yaḥkumūna
wakadhālika zayyana likathīrin mina al-mush'rikīna qatla awlādihim shurakāuhum liyur'dūhum waliyalbisū ʿalayhim dīnahum walaw shāa al-lahu mā faʿalūhu fadharhum wamā yaftarūna

waqālū hādhihi anʿāmun waḥarthun ḥij'run lā yaṭʿamuhā illā man nashāu bizaʿmihim wa-anʿāmun ḥurrimat ẓuhūruhā wa-anʿāmun lā yadhkurūna is'ma al-lahi ʿalayhā if'tirāan ʿalayhi sayajzīhim bimā kānū yaftarūna
waqālū mā fī buṭūni hādhihi al-anʿāmi khāliṣatun lidhukūrinā wamuḥarramun ʿalā azwājinā wa-in yakun maytatan fahum fīhi shurakāu sayajzīhim waṣfahum innahu ḥakīmun ʿalīmun
qad khasira alladhīna qatalū awlādahum safahan bighayri ʿil'min waḥarramū mā razaqahumu al-lahu if'tirāan ʿalā al-lahi qad ḍallū wamā kānū muh'tadīna

wahuwa alladhī ansha-a jannātin maʿrūshātin waghayra maʿrūshātin wal-nakhla wal-zarʿa mukh'talifan ukuluhu wal-zaytūna wal-rumāna mutashābihan waghayra mutashābihin kulū min thamarihi idhā athmara waātū ḥaqqahu yawma ḥaṣādihi walā tus'rifū innahu lā yuḥibbu al-mus'rifīna
wamina al-anʿāmi ḥamūlatan wafarshan kulū mimmā razaqakumu al-lahu walā tattabiʿū khuṭuwāti al-shayṭāni innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
thamāniyata azwājin mina al-ḍani ith'nayni wamina al-maʿzi ith'nayni qul āldhakarayni ḥarrama ami al-unthayayni ammā ish'tamalat ʿalayhi arḥāmu al-unthayayni nabbiūnī biʿil'min in kuntum ṣādiqīna

wamina al-ibili ith'nayni wamina al-baqari ith'nayni qul āldhakarayni ḥarrama ami al-unthayayni ammā ish'tamalat ʿalayhi arḥāmu al-unthayayni am kuntum shuhadāa idh waṣṣākumu al-lahu bihādhā faman aẓlamu mimmani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban liyuḍilla al-nāsa bighayri ʿil'min inna al-laha lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna

qul lā ajidu fī mā ūḥiya ilayya muḥarraman ʿalā ṭāʿimin yaṭʿamuhu illā an yakūna maytatan aw daman masfūḥan aw laḥma khinzīrin fa-innahu rij'sun aw fis'qan uhilla lighayri al-lahi bihi famani uḍ'ṭurra ghayra bāghin walā ʿādin fa-inna rabbaka ghafūrun raḥīmun

waʿalā alladhīna hādū ḥarramnā kulla dhī ẓufurin wamina al-baqari wal-ghanami ḥarramnā ʿalayhim shuḥūmahumā illā mā ḥamalat ẓuhūruhumā awi al-ḥawāyā aw mā ikh'talaṭa biʿaẓmin dhālika jazaynāhum bibaghyihim wa-innā laṣādiqūna
fa-in kadhabūka faqul rabbukum dhū raḥmatin wāsiʿatin walā yuraddu basuhu ʿani al-qawmi al-muj'rimīna

sayaqūlu alladhīna ashrakū law shāa al-lahu mā ashraknā walā ābāunā walā ḥarramnā min shayin kadhālika kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim ḥattā dhāqū basanā qul hal ʿindakum min ʿil'min fatukh'rijūhu lanā in tattabiʿūna illā al-ẓana wa-in antum illā takhruṣūna
qul falillahi al-ḥujatu al-bālighatu falaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna

qul halumma shuhadāakumu alladhīna yashhadūna anna al-laha ḥarrama hādhā fa-in shahidū falā tashhad maʿahum walā tattabiʿ ahwāa alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā wa-alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati wahum birabbihim yaʿdilūna

qul taʿālaw atlu mā ḥarrama rabbukum ʿalaykum allā tush'rikū bihi shayan wabil-wālidayni iḥ'sānan walā taqtulū awlādakum min im'lāqin naḥnu narzuqukum wa-iyyāhum walā taqrabū al-fawāḥisha mā ẓahara min'hā wamā baṭana walā taqtulū al-nafsa allatī ḥarrama al-lahu illā bil-ḥaqi dhālikum waṣṣākum bihi laʿallakum taʿqilūna

walā taqrabū māla al-yatīmi illā bi-allatī hiya aḥsanu ḥattā yablugha ashuddahu wa-awfū al-kayla wal-mīzāna bil-qis'ṭi lā nukallifu nafsan illā wus'ʿahā wa-idhā qul'tum fa-iʿ'dilū walaw kāna dhā qur'bā wabiʿahdi al-lahi awfū dhālikum waṣṣākum bihi laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
wa-anna hādhā ṣirāṭī mus'taqīman fa-ittabiʿūhu walā tattabiʿū al-subula fatafarraqa bikum ʿan sabīlihi dhālikum waṣṣākum bihi laʿallakum tattaqūna
thumma ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba tamāman ʿalā alladhī aḥsana watafṣīlan likulli shayin wahudan waraḥmatan laʿallahum biliqāi rabbihim yu'minūna
wahādhā kitābun anzalnāhu mubārakun fa-ittabiʿūhu wa-ittaqū laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
an taqūlū innamā unzila al-kitābu ʿalā ṭāifatayni min qablinā wa-in kunnā ʿan dirāsatihim laghāfilīna

aw taqūlū law annā unzila ʿalaynā al-kitābu lakunnā ahdā min'hum faqad jāakum bayyinatun min rabbikum wahudan waraḥmatun faman aẓlamu mimman kadhaba biāyāti al-lahi waṣadafa ʿanhā sanajzī alladhīna yaṣdifūna ʿan āyātinā sūa al-ʿadhābi bimā kānū yaṣdifūna

hal yanẓurūna illā an tatiyahumu al-malāikatu aw yatiya rabbuka aw yatiya baʿḍu āyāti rabbika yawma yatī baʿḍu āyāti rabbika lā yanfaʿu nafsan īmānuhā lam takun āmanat min qablu aw kasabat fī īmānihā khayran quli intaẓirū innā muntaẓirūna
inna alladhīna farraqū dīnahum wakānū shiyaʿan lasta min'hum fī shayin innamā amruhum ilā al-lahi thumma yunabbi-uhum bimā kānū yafʿalūna
man jāa bil-ḥasanati falahu ʿashru amthālihā waman jāa bil-sayi-ati falā yuj'zā illā mith'lahā wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
qul innanī hadānī rabbī ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin dīnan qiyaman millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
qul inna ṣalātī wanusukī wamaḥyāya wamamātī lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
lā sharīka lahu wabidhālika umir'tu wa-anā awwalu al-mus'limīna

qul aghayra al-lahi abghī rabban wahuwa rabbu kulli shayin walā taksibu kullu nafsin illā ʿalayhā walā taziru wāziratun wiz'ra ukh'rā thumma ilā rabbikum marjiʿukum fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūna
wahuwa alladhī jaʿalakum khalāifa al-arḍi warafaʿa baʿḍakum fawqa baʿḍin darajātin liyabluwakum fī mā ātākum inna rabbaka sarīʿu al-ʿiqābi wa-innahu laghafūrun raḥīmun
